channel.title: +1 Forward - Wolfspell
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/wolfspell
@Teddog and @RichRogers bring on @Epidiah to talk about his game *Wolfspell* .
Timecodes: 0:01:42 - Read a Sitch about how PbtA can help play over the internet! 0:08:29 - Open Your Brain to *Wolfspell* 0:19:39 - Act Under Fire with two newbie wolves
Eppy's website where you can find *Wolfspell* and other wonders: https://www.worldswithoutmaster.com/
